{a)(i) identification of Specimen R

  • Specimen R - Lantern/Hurricane lamp

(ii) Disadvantages of using specimen R (Lantern/ Hurricane Lamp) in poultry house

  • It pollutes the air due to the emission of carbon monoxide/soot.
  • Can lead to a fire outbreak if tripped over by birds.
  • Birds may be trapped between the space/handle and the tank of the lantern and this might lead to death. 
  • High cost of fuel.

(iii) Precautions to be taken when using specimen R(Lantern/Hurricane Lamp) in poultry house

  • Ensure that lantern is placed ín a raised position to avoid being tripped over by the birds.
  • Ensure that the fuel tank is securely locked.
  • Ensure that a little quantity of kerosene/fuel is put inside the tank at any time.
  • Provide a protective guard around the lantern to avoid birds perching on it/coming into contact with
  • it Regulates the light to reduce the emission of carbon monoxide/soot.
  • Ensure there is no leakage of kerosene.
